Name: Constrict
Desc: 30% chance to deal 125% DMG and stun the target for 3s after a 3-Ping. 10s cooldown. Cooldown is determined separately for each character.
Brief: Dealing DMG with a 3-Ping has a 30% chance to deal 125% DMG and stun the target.

Name: Recovery
Desc: Enters a "Recovery" state for 8s after a 3-Ping. Recover 1% HP every second. Cooldown is 15s and is determined separately for each character.
Brief: Enters a "Recovery" state for 8s after a 3-Ping. Recover 1% HP every second.

Name: Gravity
Desc: Enters an "Overload" state for 6s after a 3-Ping. Obtain 1 random Signal Orb and increase Movement Speed by 30%. Cooldown is 15s and is determined separately for each character.
Brief: Enters an "Overload" state for 6s after a 3-Ping. Obtain 1 random Signal Orb and increase Movement Speed by 30%

Name: Matrix
Desc: After a 3-Ping, inflict the target with "Freeze" (triggers once per second). Each stack decreases Movement Speed by 10%. After 5 stacks, trigger Matrix and remove stacks. Cooldown is 5s.
Brief: After a 3-Ping, inflict the target with "Freeze" (triggers once per second). Each stack decreases Movement Speed by 10%. After 5 stacks, trigger Matrix and remove stacks. Cooldown is 5s.

Name: Camouflage
Desc: Recovers Dodge Gauge by 200 after a 3-Ping.
Brief: Recovers Dodge Gauge by 200 after a 3-Ping.

Name: Turbulence
Desc: Generate a random number every 15s and gain the according effect: [0-24] DMG from spending Signal Orbs +30%; [25-49] Signature DMG +30%; [50-74] Basic Attack DMG +30%; [75-89] Trigger the above effect; [90-98] Character DMG -50%; [99] Deduct 100% HP from the current character.
Brief: In battle, randomly roll Destiny Points every 15s and obtain buffs corresponding to the value.

Name: Rip
Desc: Enters a "Shadow Dance" state for 8s after a 3-Ping. In this state, all DMG will follow with 15% additional DMG that will be added to the combo. Cooldown is 15s and is determined separately for each character.
Brief: Enters a "Shadow Dance" state for 8s after a 3-Ping, inflicts additional DMG in combos.

Name: Preparation
Desc: Enters a "Preparation" state for 5s after a 3-Ping. Dealing DMG in this state will lower the switching cooldown by 0.5s. Effect triggers in 1s intervals. Each trigger refreshes the timer on "Preparation".
Brief: Enters "Preparation" state for 5s after a 3-Ping. Dealing DMG in this state will lower the switching cooldown.
